message: I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $12,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you is $8,000. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but $12,000 is a bit too high for me. Given the value to me, I'm willing to pay $9,500.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking to negotiate, Bob. However, $9,500 is still a bit lower than I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value you place on it and the value I place on it.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $10,000. This is a fair price for both of us, considering our respective valuations.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to sell at $10,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price of $12,000. I'm offering the product to you for $11,500. This is the best I can do, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
